title: ABC, Easy as 123.
body_text:
Made One Year Ago: Fitzpatrick vs. Herrera
Those who had read the preview already knew of the signficance this match-up brought to the battlegrounds. Nearly a year ago, two of the biggest names with not a thing in common, agreed to a one-on-one fight the very next winter. Their number of choice was 123 and finally, that day had arrived.
With an undying heart and desire to win, legendary figures Kevin Fitzpatrick and Lenny Herrera stole this show on January 26, 2008.
Flash Results by Game
:
Fitzpatrick wins 5 to 2
Fitzpatrick: 2, 3, 4, 5, 7
Herrera: 1, 6
Moments & Stars
: Grant Cornero's [unintentional] two rimshots; Ray Marzarella's intentional two rimshots; John "Gimp" Tronolone using crutches; Ryan Letsche's explosion following a bulletball shot to the eye
RECORDS
> Attendance: 29
> Notable Returns: Bob Cornero (last competed at DB 100); Matt Larsen (last competed at DB CX); Lenny Herrera (last competed at DB CX3)
> New Players: (2) Molly Miller, Matt Rossi
- DODGEBALL 123 was the 35th straight even held on the back courts of Wall High School.
- In the main event planned one year earlier, Kevin Fitzpatrick bested Lenny Herrera 5 games to 2. Fitz's record stands at 5-3-0; Lenny's record stands at 3-4-1.
DODGEBALL 124
Secret Selection
Results
Do you feel the need to take a "Risk"? You better be.
RiskBall
debuts at DODGEBALL 124. What a way to kick-off February 2008!
